title: Your Website Safety Net: Easy Backups
subtitle: Protect your online business with automatic backups. Restore your site in a few clicks, no technical skills needed.

create.title: Create a New Backup Now
create.description: Easily create a complete snapshot of your website. This includes all your content, images, settings, and even custom touches.

list.title: Your Backup History
list.emptyDescription: Create your first backup today to secure your website's future.

restore.title: Restore Your Website from a Backup
restore.description: Select a backup point and restore your website to that version. It's a simple way to go back if you need to. This can't be undone, so choose carefully!
restore.warning: Important: This will replace your current website content with the backup version.
restore.confirm: I understand this will replace my current website
